ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
1.3-megapixel camera with 8x digital zoom and video capture capabilities
Bluetooth connectivity for wireless headsets and hands-free communication use, as well as streaming music to a pair of compatible Bluetooth stereo headphones or compatible stereo system.
Easy-to-read color display (measures 1.8 inches with a 128 x 160-pixel resolution)
FM Radio; Speakerphone; Vibrating ringer
ProductInfo.Name: Motorola EM330 Unlocked GSM Cell Phone with 1.3MP Camera, FM Radio, MP3 Player and Bluetooth - Black
